explains: n. 自信，把握；（人寿）保险；保证，确保
wordGroup: quality assurance 质量保证；品质保证
life assurance n. 人寿保险；（保险公司付给的）人寿保险金；（被保险人缴纳的）人寿保险费
assurance coefficient 安全系数，保险系数；保证系数

sentences.en: He would like an assurance that other forces will not move into the territory that his forces vacate.
sentences.cn: 他想要其他部队不会进入他的部队撤出的那个领地的一个保证。

sentences.en: A review of this book in The Times lamented that Mr. Davis had given us no especial assurance that any of the traditional accidents can save us once more.
sentences.cn: 《泰晤士报》的一篇书评惋惜道：“戴维斯先生并没有向我们保证，任何传统的事故都能再次拯救我们。”

sentences.en: This recommendation should be rejected as dangerous, however, since there is no assurance that the watch commanders' standards will continue to be observed once approval is longer required.
sentences.cn: 然而，这项建议应以危险的理由予以拒绝，因为无法保证一旦核准时间变长，监测指挥官的标准还能继续得到维持。
